author: Wendgames
title: House Merge Empire
text:
House Merge Empire OFFICIAL LAUNCH + APK + MOD + HINTS
House Merge Empire MOD APK Free Download
Game Features:
Merge and Upgrade: Combine two identical houses to form a superior house. Each new house you create generates more money in less time, helping you expand your empire faster.
Crystal Collection: Achieve a new highest-level house to earn precious crystals. These crystals are key to your success, as they boost your overall income by 1% per crystal, making every merge more rewarding.
Strategic Tile Management: Houses are placed on tiles, and careful planning is required to maximize your merging potential. Plan your moves ahead to keep your empire growing efficiently.
Increasing Difficulty: As you progress, the game gradually becomes more challenging. Keep your merging strategies sharp to stay ahead and continue expanding your empire.
Rebirth: When the game gets tough, use the rebirth option to start over. Rebirth resets your house progress but retains your crystals. With each rebirth, your crystals grant permanent income boosts, allowing you to rebuild and advance faster each time.
Diverse House Themes: Enjoy a variety of house themes that bring unique aesthetics to your empire. From the grandeur of ancient Egypt to the innovation of modern architecture, each theme adds a fresh and exciting visual experience to your merging.
Random Boosts: Watch for the spaceship and UFO that randomly might pass the screen. Click them to watch an ad and receive limited-time boosts. The spaceship grants a 5x increase to all money earned for 1 minute, while the UFO grants a 2x speed boost for 1 minute.
Gameplay Experience:
In House Merge Empire, your goal is to merge and upgrade houses to build the most prosperous empire. Every decision matters as you balance merging, managing space, and collecting crystals. With its increasing difficulty, strategic rebirth system, and exciting random boosts, the game offers endless replayability and satisfaction.
Are you ready to merge, upgrade, and create the ultimate empire? Download House Merge Empire now!
